title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 23 April 2009 - XWiki
content:

kraze - (23/04/2009 00:08): sdumitriu: I did copy the code in its entirety...

kraze - (23/04/2009 00:14): I guess my next problem is the .js files it references as attachments.  they're missing

alexmaru - (23/04/2009 10:12): hi guys  
alexmaru - (23/04/2009 10:12): :)  
asyd - (23/04/2009 10:12): hello there  
alexmaru - (23/04/2009 10:12): wanna have some laughs?  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 10:12): Hi  
asyd - (23/04/2009 10:12): sure :)  
alexmaru - (23/04/2009 10:12): check out this hilarious code comments: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/184618?sort=votes&page=1  
alexmaru - (23/04/2009 10:12): :P  
asyd - (23/04/2009 10:13): hehe  
alexmaru - (23/04/2009 10:14): return 1; # returns 1   
alexmaru - (23/04/2009 10:14): :))  
asyd - (23/04/2009 10:14): yeah  
asyd - (23/04/2009 10:14): I like this one:  
asyd - (23/04/2009 10:14): When I wrote this, only God and I understood what I was doing  
asyd - (23/04/2009 10:14): Now, God only knows  
asyd - (23/04/2009 10:14): he's probably writes perl  
alexmaru - (23/04/2009 10:15): :)  
alexmaru - (23/04/2009 10:15): yeah  
alexmaru - (23/04/2009 10:15): now, back to work :P  
asyd - (23/04/2009 10:16): :)  
cypromis - (23/04/2009 10:22): nah  
cypromis - (23/04/2009 10:22): he writes english  
cypromis - (23/04/2009 10:22): :P

asyd - (23/04/2009 10:37): :)  
JiBz - (23/04/2009 10:37): ^^  
JiBz - (23/04/2009 10:37): very funny  
Enygma` - (23/04/2009 10:38): Now it's time for that "It's funny because it's true!" quote. I actually encountered a lot of these :P

ChathuraPrabuddh - (23/04/2009 16:23): glerouge:hai  
glerouge - (23/04/2009 16:23):  hi  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (23/04/2009 16:24): I'm working on the JIRA issue XWIKI-3677:http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-3677  
glerouge - (23/04/2009 16:25): yep  
anamarias left at 16:25 ()  
glerouge - (23/04/2009 16:25): what do you need to know ?  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (23/04/2009 16:25): I would like to know the way to generate the relevant error message  
glerouge - (23/04/2009 16:26): I think you need to look at ApplicationResource.properties -> find the matching translation key -> then do a search in your eclipse workspace on that translation key to see in which template it's being used  
glerouge - (23/04/2009 16:26): then you'll basically have to add #startmessagebox() #endmessagebox() around it  
glerouge - (23/04/2009 16:26): with the right parameters in #startmessagebox(" parameter")  
glerouge - (23/04/2009 16:27): not sure where you can find that macro's documentation though  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (23/04/2009 16:29): glerouge: I'll have look at it. Thanks :)  
glerouge - (23/04/2009 16:29): to see the error message in context, simply try attaching a very big file on your local wiki  
glerouge - (23/04/2009 16:30): anything over 10MB should trigger the message  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (23/04/2009 16:31): glerouge:But I able to attach a file with 14MB. Nothing went wrong  
glerouge - (23/04/2009 16:31): try with a bigger one  
glerouge - (23/04/2009 16:31): a 300MB one if needed  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (23/04/2009 16:33): ok. I'll try again.  
asiri left at 16:35 ("Leaving.")  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (23/04/2009 16:38): glerouge:I got the warning message. Thanks :)  
glerouge - (23/04/2009 16:39): cool  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (23/04/2009 16:40): Anyway 50Mb is the best to test problem otherwise it gives a page load error :)  
tachirei joined #xwiki at 16:45  
JiBz left at 16:46 ("http://www.mibbit.com ajax IRC Client")  
tachirei - (23/04/2009 16:58): Hi!  
tachirei - (23/04/2009 17:02): florinciu: since for GSoC I'll add style support to XOffice and I'll port XWord add-in to MS Office 2003, I have some things I would like to discuss  
tachirei - (23/04/2009 17:02): are you busy now?  
florinciu - (23/04/2009 17:03): nothing it can't wait. Please ask  
tachirei - (23/04/2009 17:04): what's the name for the project? I need it for gsoc.myxwiki.org. It remains "Style and template support for XOffice"?  
tachirei - (23/04/2009 17:06): or should I use "XWiki Office Integration" - which is actually the name for XOffice?  
florinciu - (23/04/2009 17:06): use the name of the proposal for now  
tachirei - (23/04/2009 17:07): ok   
tachirei - (23/04/2009 17:09): any idea about how we will deal with the code? Will I work in a sandbox? How will I reuse existing code? Two distinct solutions? One solution with different projects?  
florinciu - (23/04/2009 17:10): I don't know yet. We need to decide that in the next 2-3 weeks.  
tachirei - (23/04/2009 17:11): ofc, I don't need an immediate answer. These things must be well analyzed.  
sdumitriu2 left at 17:11 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
tachirei - (23/04/2009 17:16): should I create an issue about this? perhaps others can come with their own ideas

ChathuraPrabuddh - (23/04/2009 22:04): Hai   
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:04): Hi  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (23/04/2009 22:06): hai sdumitriu. I need some documentation regarding the #startmessagebox & #endmessagebox macros  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (23/04/2009 22:08): I need some way to pass the context message parameter to above macro.  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:08): Did you find those macros?  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:08): I mean, their source?  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (23/04/2009 22:08): nope.:-(  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:09): trunks/web/standard/src/main/webapp/templates/macros.vm  
jvelociter joined #xwiki at 22:09  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:09): The macros are not that smart at all  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:11): sdumitriu: cool the suggest cleanup  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:11): Yes, still a lot to go  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:11): have you seen evalica 's proposal for the design ?  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:12): I'd like to move it in the resources/js/xwiki/widgets folder  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:12): it means we'll have to change the elements created  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:12): yeah but have to be careful with that  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (23/04/2009 22:12): sdumitriu:thanks I'll hav look :)  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:12): Yes, that's why I didn't do it  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:13): it means everybody that used $xwiki.jsfx.use("js/suggest/ajaxSuggest.js") will have to change code  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:13): that's a pain  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:13): Hm, no  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:13): It's global in javascript.vm  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:13): ah right  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:13): So there shouldn't be a problem after all  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:13): because it's use in almost every page  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:13): but still we'll face that issue some day for other libs  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:13): Yes  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:14): I wish we had a dependency loading mechanism, a la Dojo  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:14): for example I don't really know how I can keep compatibility with the old lightbox  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:14): yeah that's pretty cool  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:15): and there's CSS compatibility which I don't know how to handle too  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:15): I think we should drop the old lightbox completely  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:15): yes  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:15): I mean, don't switch  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:15): Have 2  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:15): mmh  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:15): Deprecate the old one  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:15): what we could do is say we are going to keep the files available for 2 releases  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:15): And after we migrate completely, drop it (for 3.0?)  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:15): yeah  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:16): yes  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:16): anyway it does not matter too much how long we keep it  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:16): we have to log calls and discourage pple using it  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:17): I started to replace it with http://code.google.com/p/modalbox  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:17): I also added a modal dialog box widget  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:17): ah  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:17): It's a really simple one  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:17): that's why I asked you the other day ;)  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:17): It doesn't do much  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:17): the one for the jump to page ?  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:17): It's supposed to be extended by other classes  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:17): Yes  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:17): okay  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:17): It's not as rich as the lightbox  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:18): modalbox is pretty nice  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:18): http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-3694  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:18): it has resize option, callback after loading / hiding  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:18): I have to go now  
sdumitriu - (23/04/2009 22:18): Bye  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:18): k  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 22:18): Bye

jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:07): evalica: very nice http://incubator.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Improvements/BoxExample  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:07): big fan :)  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:07): merci J  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:07): I have some problems on IE6 - I'll fix them tomorrow  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:07): sure  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:08): you kept the same CSS classes ?  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:08): (evalica: )  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:08): classes names I mean  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:08): I added more.. and changed some ...   
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:08): I want to review that vm  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:08): with your help  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:08): and cut all the unnecesary part  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:09): ok. it's several .vm nos ?  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:09): no ?  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:09): I don't know ...  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:09): I just copy paste the html generated and worked on that for styling  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:09): ok, we'll see that  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:09): I didn't touch the vms  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:10): if it were only CSS it would have been commited tomorrow :P  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:10): no .. It's not.. I'm sorry ..  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:10): Im kidding, it the HTML changes are needed then be it, we'll work this out  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:10): no worry  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:10): there were to few classes to work on it..  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:11): we have to make a macro out of it so everybody can use such a box  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:12): with general naming :) ye ye   
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:14): jvelociter: did you send 3 mails about grid? all the same? :)   
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:15): aaa.. just 2   
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:15): yeah  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:15): I hit "Reply" instead fo "Replay All" again :(  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:15): "That's part of your job to make it clear it's integrated with grid" .. this sound so bad :) ... I need help from you to do that :) ...   
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:15): bad habit  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:16): evalica: I meant visually  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:16): I'll read the mail tomorrow so I understand what you meant :P   
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:16): we need a visual hint that says both works together  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:17): I don't know really how... maybe a merged light background  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:17): that would make one block  
jvelociter - (23/04/2009 23:17): you see what I mean ?  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:17): so ... they will stick like that?   
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:17): this is the final version?  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:17): with the two radios?  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:18): I want to style them ... but ... I would have liked a version without the radios ...   
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:19): and with the advanced options... so I can think .. how many componets I have  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:19): how I can arrange them  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:19): we will talk personally :)   
jvelociter\_ joined #xwiki at 23:19  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:20): re evalica   
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:20): unplugged my router accidently :)  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:20): lol  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:20): no they will not stay like this  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:20): maybe I did not formulate it good  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:20): I need the options, but under what form can change  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:21): we just need a icon / link / whatever to be able to have advanced options  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:21): (hidden by default)  
sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 23:21  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:21): and those options can be radio / checkboxes / whatever, again it's not important  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:21): they need to be what's best for them :)  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:21): but we need them, that's for sure  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:22): we should make a final list of options will have  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:22): have you fixed the IE .. JS stuff?  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:22): nope not yet  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:22): I'll try to look at it tomorrow  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:23): we'll talk for the options  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:23): but it's not going to be much  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:23): like 2/3 options max  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:23): but you can start working without the final list actually  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:23): on the rest of the UI  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:23): since options will be hidden at first  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:23): k.. J .. I need to know exactly for many options there will be ... if I don't I can't know how I'll arrange them :)  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:24): rest of the UI.. meaning the tags?  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:24): max 3  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:24): yes tags + grid  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:24): do you want something more for the grid?  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:24): no  
jvelociter\_ - (23/04/2009 23:24): just that the tags looks like part of the same system  
evalica - (23/04/2009 23:24): k :)
